text: jinhe Allah ta’ala ne apne fazl se kuch de rakha hai wo us mein apni kanjoosi ko apne liye behtar qayaal na kare, balke wo un ke liye nihaayath badh-tar hai, anqareeb qayaamath waale din ye apni kanjoosi ki cheez ke tauq daale jayenge, asmaano aur zameen ki miraas Allah hee ke liye hai aur jo kuch tum kar rahe ho, us se Allah ta’ala agaah hai
